name: bubble
slogan: bubble is an on-demand childcare platform,  using big data to digitise trust
description:
At bubble we’re on a mission to make parents happier. We do this by using technology to solve their biggest daily pain point – access to great childcare. Our on-demand childcare app uses social data to connect parents with carers already used within their trusted personal networks. We’re using innovative technology to digitise trust and deliver exceptional and impactful customer experiences.

Every month more than 10,000 childcare requests get sent out over bubble – traction achieved from strong word-of-mouth and limited marketing activity. Our customers love and are passionate about what we do (check us out on Trustpilot) and our investors founded some of the UK’s biggest digital success stories, such as Betfair, Boohoo and Photobox.

jobs.title: Customer Success Hero
jobs.description:
Job Description and Responsibilities

Our 5-star rating on Trustpilot is largely down to our relentless focus on outstanding customer service. You’ll be leading from the front here, with a daily focus on:

- Customer Service: Dealing with customer queries and feedback quickly and professionally
- Verification: Overseeing the ID verification and background checking processes  all of our sitters must clear through.
- Curation: Curating sitter profiles to ensure a high-quality experience for parents 
- Operations: Assisting with our daily payment processes, ensuring our hero sitters get paid on time.

You need to have:

- Perfect English - verbal and written .
- Great communication skills. You are engaging, affable and people like you!
- Superb organisational skills and an ability to expertly juggle a few things at once 
- A can-do attitude – you roll your sleeves up and get things done. You don’t shirk a challenge and you know what it means to work hard.

It’s a big plus if you have:

- Experience working for other early-stage tech startups
- Previous customer service for online companies
- Good working knowledge of Mailchimp, Zendesk, Slack and other CRM platforms

jobs.title: Head of Community
jobs.description:
At bubble, we let parents be all that they need to be.

We are a venture-backed tech startup, changing the lives of parents for the better and growing fast. Ask any parent and they’ll tell you that the impact on one’s life of having easy access to quality childcare is profound. The mums, dads and carers in our community love and rely on our service every day and we are passionate and dedicated towards delivering them amazing customer experiences. 

Whilst we are hugely proud of our technology, our success to date has been underpinned by our focus on delivering amazing customer service. We’ve built a highly scalable customer success function, blending smart tech and automation, with wonderful human beings who care deeply about making our customers feel good. We are now looking for a driven, passionate and smart team leader. Someone with high emotional intelligence and a real desire to build a great team and deliver the type of service that surprises and delights customers.

We’re still a small team with a huge amount of work to do. This is a management role that still requires someone to get stuck into the day to day work. To lead by example and build out a customer success team that will, as it’s done to date, continue to be the driving force of bubble’s success. 

**Responsibilities:**

* **Team management:** Assume responsibility for the wellbeing, performance and development of 4-5 customer success associates. Design and oversee how the team is structured and working day to day.
* **Targets & KPIs:** Implement a set of team-specific targets and KPIs that will be monitored and reported on a daily/weekly and monthly basis. 
* **Customer service:** Respond to customer queries that come through on Zendesk and Intercom. 
* **Operations:** Carry out our daily pay runs and sitter approval processes.
* **Community management:** Take ownership of building, growing and looking after in particular our community of 20,000 approved sitters. Implementing processes, comms and features that lead to greater sitter engagement and loyalty.
* **Customer feedback:** Take charge of all customer feedback processes and programmes. Ensuring that the entire business always understands deeply how our community is feeling and what they want to see from us.


**Skills & experience required:**

* **High growth:** You have 5-8 years in customer success roles, ideally in a digital environment and/or at a high-growth startup.
* **Digital know-how:** You have strong experience using the various online tools and software programmes required to build a highly effective customer success function. 
* **Team builder:** You have experience building and managing a team to high performance.
* **Great communicator:** You have excellent spoken and written word. Skills that you use effectively for communicating with customers and your team.
* **Attention to detail:** You care deeply about the detail and getting things right. You can demonstrate this and high achievement in previous work.
* **Influencer:** You have a great combination of empathy and conviction - allowing you to bring people along with you even when making tough decisions that can’t possibly give everyone what they want.
* **Innovator: **You come with your own ideas on how to build a world class customer success and community function - and the tenacity to see these ideas put into practice. 


**Benefits**

* Competitive salary plus share options
* 25 days a year holiday
* West London office location (once normality returns!)
